summary: Ever wanted that extra kick in your active effects too own that final boss? Or a simple giggle here and there? Then look no more, friend! Topkeks have arrived in Skyrim and are here to make a mark in the history books.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][color=#3c78d8]TOPKEKS[/color] [color=#ffff00]IN[/color] [/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#93c47d][size=6]SKYRIM.[/size][/color][/font][/u][/center][font=Comic Sans MS]
[color=#cc0000][size=6][u]Potions[/u][/size][/color]
[color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Between you and me, vanilla potions are not that great and had a lot of expectations 
that did not succeed to accomplish and ironically it's predecesors did.
This mod obliterates the concept of "Potions", a working project of crazy effects with sweetness spread on it.
The Topkeks are in many variety and subvariety, becoming a major aspect and soon to be a whole new mechanic in the game. Heres a overall of what the Topkeks do, (for now they all last 60 seconds)[/size][/color]
[/font]
[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][color=#ea9999]List of topkeks[/color]
[/size][/font][/b]
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]***All Topkeks effects last for 60 secconds except the golden (3 min)***
[/size][/font][/b][size=3]You can buy topkeks in the topkek shop located at the middle of Riften[/size][/center]


[b][color=#f9cb9c][size=5]Vanilla TopKeK (Crafting):[/size][/color]
[size=4]-[/size] [size=3]Increase alchemy +75
- Increase enchantment +75
- Increase smithing +75
[/size][/b][color=#b45f06][size=5][b]Chocolate TopKeK (Heavy):[/b][/size][/color]
[size=4]-[/size] [size=3]Increase block +75[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase heavy armor +100[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase marksman +80[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase regeneration  +85[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase stamina regeneration +300[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase 2 handed sword damage +75[/size]
[color=#f6b26b][size=5][b]Mango TopKeK (Light):[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase carry weight +1000[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] Increase regeneration  +85
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase light armor +100[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase 1 handed damage +80[/size]
[size=5][color=#3c78d8][b]BlueBerry TopKeK (Magic):[/b][/color]
[/size] [size=4][b]-[/b][/size] [b][size=3]Increase alteration +100[/size]
[/b] [size=3][b]-[/b][/size] [b][size=3]Increase conjuration +100[/size]
[/b] [size=3][b]-[/b][/size] [b][size=3]Increase destruction +100[/size]
[/b] [size=3][b]-[/b][/size] [b][size=3]Increase illusion +100[/size]
[/b] [size=3][b]-[/b][/size] [size=3][b]Increase magika regeneration +600[/b][/size]
[b][color=#e06666][size=5]Cherry TopKeK (Protect):[/size][/color]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase fire resistance +75[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase ice resistance +75[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase magic resistance +75[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase poison resistance +75[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase lightning resistance +75[/size]
[color=#93c47d][size=5]Pistachio topkek (Thieft):[/size][/color]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase lockpicking +100[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase speech +999[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase pickpocket +100[/size]
[size=3]-[/size] [size=3]Increase sneak +200
[/size][color=#e69138][size=5]Golden topkek:[/size][/color]
[size=3]- Increase health regeneration +400
- Increase health +500
- Increase cary weight +99999
- Increase fire resistance +150
- Increase ice resistance +150
- Increase magic resistance +150
- Increase lighning resistance +150[/size]

[size=3]The Topkek Vendor is in Riften, near the open shops.

[b][size=3]We will listen to your feedback and your opinions, [/size]
[size=3]thoughts and ideas. This mod is for the hell of it.[/size][/b]
[/size]
[size=3]Thank you for your support, give us a spot to show you what we can do.[/size]
[size=3]Currently these are the things we have in mind for the future[/size]

[size=6][u][color=#3c78d8][center]What we plan to do[/center]
[/color][/u][/size][/b]        [size=3]- A Long Quest involving the Daedric Topkek
- Freshness mechanic, effects diminishing at the quality of the Topkek[/size][b][size=3]
- More Topkek[/size][/b][b]

[u][color=#93c47d][size=5][center]Installation[/center][/size][/color][/u]
[size=3]-[/size] Drag and drop Topkek.esp, meshes and Textures into your /data folder
[/b]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e69138][size=6][u][center]Thank You for your support![/center][/u][/size][/color]

[color=#cc0000][size=5][b]Thanks to RefurbMadness for making the real topkeks models and more![/b][/size][/color][/font]
author: clemanitor
